email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. The laycan is 15-20 October. I can offer a starting freight rate of $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Given the current market, we were hoping for something in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Can you check with the owner if they can adjust? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I discussed your counteroffer with the owner. They’re willing to come down to $51.25 per metric ton, which is a fair compromise given the vessel’s specifications and the tight laycan. Let me know if this works for you. Cheers, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for following up. $51.25 is acceptable, but we’d like to confirm the demurrage terms. Could you provide details on the demurrage rate and any additional clauses? Looking forward to your response. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, the demurrage rate is set at $25,000 per day, pro rata, with 12 hours notice time. The laytime is 72 hours total, split between load and discharge ports. Let me know if you need further clarification or if we can proceed to finalize the fixture. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, the demurrage terms are acceptable. Let’s proceed with the fixture at $51.25 per metric ton. Please send over the recap for review. Thanks for your assistance throughout this negotiation. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Fixture Recap - MV Ocean Star
email_chain.body: Hi John, as discussed, please find the fixture recap attached for the MV Ocean Star. Freight rate: $51.25 per metric ton, laycan 15-20 October, demurrage at $25,000 per day. Let me know if everything looks good. Looking forward to working together. Best regards, Sarah
